centralbanknews.info/2015/05/this-week-i.snippet: This week, May 4 through May 9, central banks from eight countries or jurisdictions are scheduled to decide on monetary policy: Australia, Georgia, Poland, Albania, Romania, the Czech Republic, Malaysia and Norway.
